config.PlayerGender.name: Player Gender
config.PlayerGender.description: True for using the terms "husband" and "wife" based on what gender was selected when making a farm. False for using "spouse" on the farmer.
config.PlayerGenderFarmer.name: Player Gender
config.PlayerGenderFarmer.description: (ONLY IF YOU'RE MARRYING ANOTHER FARMER) True for using the terms "husband" and "wife" for your farmer spouse based on what gender was selected when making a farm. False for using "spouse" on the farmer spouse.
husbands: @... %spouse... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husbands in life!$h
wives: @... %spouse... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you wives in life!$h
spouses: @... %spouse... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you spouses in life!$h
spouseWife: @... %spouse... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you spouses in life!$h
spouseHusband: @... %spouse... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you spouses in life!$h
husbandSpouse: @... %spouse... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you spouses in life!$h
